extendedInfo.description: For your kids to learn math while having fun and playing.With this play, children learn to add, subtract, multiply, count and distinguish from a list of numbers which is greater and which is smaller. To make learning fun each possible outcome is represented by a ball related sport football, basketball, tennis and baseball.Â Match 10 results for victory.Do a Home Run, scores a goal, a free kick or a rest to mathematics.Â It is a game suitable for children from 5 years but also for adults, as the head do math helps us to maintain a young and agile mind.Â Features:Â - 5 operations (add, subtract, multiply, major and minor). Note: The free version is only available to add, the maximum and minimum.- An option that teach children to count from 1 to 24. Note: Only in the full version.- Voices in several languagesââ: English, Spanish, French, Italian, German, Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Dutch, Korean and Portuguese that some options will tell the operation to perform.- 3 difficulty levels.- Different animations depending on whether you are right or sports-related missed the ball for the selected result.All options are represented by symbols recognizable by children to not be necessary to read and so you can use any language independently.Keywords: Sports, Preschool, Numbers, Sum, Subtract, Max, Min, Addition, Multiply, Kids, Educational, Child, Children, Soccer, Tennis, Baseball, Basketball, Football, Count

reviews.title: Kids maths and sport.
reviews.comment: It\'s ok for there year olds not eleven the graphics of movement is bad as well. two start has been specially awarded ;) not bad. Harry Beeney
